title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: Police Box
address: Earls Court Road, outside Earl's Court station
content: This police box was intended as part of a 1990s high-tech revival of the 1920s-60s police box system.  The experiment failed and this is now the only police box left in London.  It remains as street furniture and is quite popular with fans of the TV series ''Doctor Who''.
